title: Riot Dont Test gj

replies.body:
They did test it though.

Also, the PBE exists.

Also, according to lolalytics.com (at the time of posting) for 130+ champions the win rate delta from the highest win rate champion to the lowest is 11.4pp. Which is actually extremely good, especially when compared with other online games.

These things happen, from what I've seen the argument is surrounding the fallout and how Riot handles it.
